text: Damian Łukasik (born 26 February 1964) is a retired Polish football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:Hapoel Tel Aviv F.C. players Category:Dyskobolia Grodzisk Wielkopolski players Category:Association football defenders Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Israel Category:Poland international footballers
